definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

sentences.english: Only with sweats can you harvest happiness.
sentences.chinese: 只有拋灑汗珠顆顆，才能收穫歡樂陣陣。

sentences.english: International treaties prohibiting dumping at sea must be enforced.
sentences.chinese: 有關禁止向海洋拋灑垃圾的國際協定必須實施。

sentences.english: They shower the newly married pair with rice.
sentences.chinese: 他們把大量的米拋灑在這對新人身上。
